message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product that I think you'll love. I'm looking for $200 for it.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand you're on a budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I can meet you in the middle at $180. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $180 is still a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider $150?
